data.name: Moon Breakers:  Big Cheese Bundle DLC
data.detailed_description:
Want to step into the Big League son? Are you ready to put your toys away? Let me make you an offer you just can’t refuse. Four, count ‘em, top-class ships for your hangar that will give you the edge on any mission. Taking down a carrier? Grabbing some He-3 or just out to take down some flyboys on the other side? Kid, this offer will even bag you a x10 Boost, you know how rare those things are? Heck, you’ll earn so much Cred you’ll need to buy another ship just to HOLD it all!

Save over 20% on this bundle when compared to purchasing the individual items in game!

Big Cheese Bundle Includes

  • G5 Kingfisher
  • F-3X Sidewinder
  • B-10G Grizzly
  • F-100 Hammerhead
  • x10 25 Game Boost

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Operating System: Windows XP or better
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 512 MB
  • Video: OpenGL 2.0 with 128 MB of Video RAM
  • Sound: Stereo Audio Output
  • DirectX®: dx50
  • Additional:Permanent Internet connection required

data.legal_notice: Moon Breakers Copyright 2012, Imba Entertainment Inc. Audio Engine: FMOD Sound System by Firelight Technologies.
